did.unittitle: Photographed Copies of Karl Marx Correspondence, 1850-1963
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor- Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Copies of Karl Marx correspondence from the Tamiment Institute and related materials.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of copies of Karl Marx correspondence from the Tamiment Institute, The Tamiment Institute Library Bulletin on Marx and Engels holdings, and published copies of two speeches by Karl Marx.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.
